scripts.name: YouTube View Most Popular and Newest Uploader Videos (2018+)
scripts.description: See the user's most 'Popular' and 'Newest' video pages in a sliding-dropdown preview without even having to leave the video page.

scripts.name: YouTube Two Best Friends Play Skip Intro
scripts.description: Skips the first 7 second intro of any Two Best Friends Play videos.

scripts.name: Checkvist Focus Trail Display
scripts.description: Displays a dynamic breadcrumb location trail that shows where you are while in both standard and (hoist) focus mode.

scripts.name: Bugmenot Button 2015
scripts.description: Adds menu button that opens the Bugmenot user/password page for the current site you are visiting.

scripts.name: PrimeWire Movie Trailers and Reviews
scripts.description: #1 Most Useful Script for Primewire. Adds links to movie/TV show trailers and reviews from YouTube, IMDB and Rotten Tomatoes. Also adds new bonus site features.

scripts.name: Freesound Direct Mp3/Ogg Links
scripts.description: Adds direct Mp3 and Ogg audio file download links on freesound.org

scripts.name: Firedrive Putlocker Sockshare Skip
scripts.description: Skip waiting screen at Firedrive, Putlocker, Sockshare and 21+ more video hosting sites.

scripts.name: Youtube Unblocker

scripts.name: JDownloader Autostart Video Hosts
scripts.description: Automatically starts download of the hosted video file with JDownloader on many host sites.

scripts.name: Youtube Scrolling Comments Layout 2017
scripts.description: Modern layout for 1080p res, lets you watch videos while being able to scroll and read the entire comments section, by pinning the YouTube video to the left-side page. Plus, a sleek 'More Videos by same user' playlist feed is auto-generated for the current channel and 2 very useful quicklinks are added: 'Most Popular' and 'Newest' sorted user videos. See screenshot for preview.

scripts.name: Google Restore Underline
scripts.description: Restores underlining to Google title results.

scripts.name: Primewire Host Highlighter
scripts.description: Automatically highlights the provider or host of your choice wherever it appears on a page listing, allowing you to quickly locate and click your favorite host to start watching.

scripts.name: Google Search Terms Highlight
scripts.description: Automatically highlights search terms & full phrases in pages opened by Google search results.

scripts.name: Google & YouTube - Universal Exact Search Hotkey

scripts.name: YouTube Video Speed & Seek Mouse Control
scripts.description: Dynamically adjust video playback speed & seeking instantly with your mousewheel, no more need to go through player menus every time.

scripts.name: Wikipedia 2 Wikiwand
scripts.description: This script is an easy way to try out and view Wikiwand which displays a clean and modernized version of Wikipedia.

scripts.description: Adds menu button that returns the earliest capture record of the current webpage, preventing error 404, empty or false captures.

scripts.name: YouTube Most Popular Videos By User
scripts.description: Adds 2 very useful subtle links under the player to the current user's Uploaded Videos page sorted by popularity and by newest.
